p: The Molecular Signatures Database (MSigDB database v7.2) is a compilation of annotated gene sets from various sources such as online pathway databases, the biomedical literature, and manual curation by domain experts [ 15, 26]. We selected the collection “Canonical Pathways” composed of 2199 curated gene sets of pathways annotated from the following databases; Reactome (1499), KEGG (186), BIOCARTA (289), Pathway Interaction Database (196), Matrisome project (10), Signaling Gateway (8), Sigma Aldrich (10), SuperArray SABiosciences (1) ( http://software.broadinstitute.org/gsea/msigdb).
